name: Mobile Resell Shope
projectType: Buy and sell second-hand mobiles. Here you can advertise and buy old mobiles for sale. This website has separate dashboard for user seller and admin. If desired, one can pay the price on the mobile purchased here
technology: ReactJS, React-router-dom, Firebase, ExpressJS, MongoDB, JWT, StripeJs, TailwindCSS, DaysiUI, React-hook-form, React-icons

name: Doctors Portals
projectType: Daily patient appointment. Patients are online on this website There is an opportunity to take service. Any patient can take one service per day. You can make a booking for the service.
technology: ReactJS, React-day-picker, React-router-dom, Firebase, ExpressJS, MongoDB, StripeJs, TailwindCSS, React-hook-form, React-hot-toast

name: PHoTo FesTival
projectType: Service review system. Patients are online on this website There is an opportunity to take service. Any patient can take one service per day. You can make a booking for the service.
technology: ReactJS, React-router-dom, Firebase,React-photo-view, ExpressJS, MongoDB, TailwindCSS, DaysiUI,  React-hot-toast
